String.string: Go to Commander Fraya at federation headquarters in Allemantheia.
Take a pegasus to Velika and find Priestess Ciebel at Velik's Steps.
Meet with Elleon in Castanica in Ostgarath Province.
Speak with Commander Fraya in Castanica.
Go to the Hungry Caverns and find Smernav at the Avenger Outpost.
Kill Dulinka and his mekkitars at the southern end of the Cavern of Shackles.
Bring Gluorn's Ledger to Commander Fraya in Castanica.
Bring Gluorn's Ledger to Commander Fraya in Castanica.
